ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Another Bard/Enchanter Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... hate ... woohoo! that is actually the goal :o) The Enchanter can t cast Sneeze without the mob making a bee-line to her. So we are hoping that between Hymn
ygData.messageBody:
>Largo's does not break mez. It will however put you way up there on the
hate
>list of the mobs, so be sparing in your use of it especially on really big
>pulls where the enchanter may have difficulty keeping all the mobs mezzed.
>If your enchanter isn't doing attack speed buffs, then you may want to play
>anthem instead (depends on how many tanks you have)


woohoo! that is actually the goal :o) The Enchanter can't cast Sneeze
without the mob making a bee-line to her. So we are hoping that between Hymn
and Largo's I will start being the first choice. Which is pretty funny,
because in her last incarnation as a Warrior her entire Taunt-cycle was
spent trying to keep the mobs off ME.

Thanks!

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
